Yakubu Mohammed (amụrụ na 25 Machị 1973) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye nduzi, onye na-agụ egwu na odee

Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Globacom, onye nnọchianya SDGs na n'otu oge, onye nnọchiteanya maka Nescafe Beverage. Yakubu Mohammed bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke a ma ama na aha ezinụlọ na Kannywood na Nollywood

Ọ bụrụla ihe karịrị otu puku egwu, gosipụtakwa na ihe karịrị otu narị ihe nkiri Hausa na ihe karịrị irí anọ ihe nkiri Bekee nke ụfọdụ n'ime ha gụnyere; Lionheart, 4th Republic, Sons of the Caliphate na MTV Shuga nke mere ka ọ nweta ọtụtụ nhọpụta na onyinye dịka City People Entertainment Awards na Nigeria Entertainment Awards.
Yakubu Mohammed malitere na Kannywood dị ka ọ dị na 1998 na-ede edemede ma na-arụ ọrụ n'azụ ebe ahụ
N'okporo ụzọ, a zụrụ ya n'ọrụ ahụ ka ọ na-arịgo n'ọkwa na faịlụ ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ hụrụ onwe ya na-akpọ ndị na-agba égbè

Yakubu dị ka onye na-agụ egwu edekọla ihe karịrị otu puku egwu maka ihe nkiri egwu na abọm na Hausa na Bekee.
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ site na ndabere ruo ogologo oge, ọ nwetara ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Gabar Cikin Gida na 2013 ebe ya na enyi ya na onye mmekọ ya Sani Musa Danja gosipụtara. O mere njem gaa Nollywood na 2016 site na nke mbụ na Sons of the Caliphate ya na onye ọrụ ibe ya Rahama Sadau ma gosikwa na MTV Shuga na Lionheart
